author: kingpanther13
releaseNotes:
v0.1.0 - Parent/Child Architecture:
- BREAKING CHANGE: Rules are now child apps with isolated settings
- Each rule is a separate app instance under MCP Rule Server
- Fixed settings cross-contamination between rules
- Rules now behave like native Rule Machine with sub-apps
- MCP tools still work to create/modify/delete rules
- Added version display in app UI

v0.0.6 - Fixed trigger/condition/action save flow.
v0.0.5 - Bug fixes and UI improvements.
v0.0.4 - Added full Rule Engine UI.
v0.0.3 - Initial release.
